blocks.name: nnindf
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction, using a bound-variable hypothesis instead of distinct variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnindf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
} = {
  simprd(wcel(c0, cn), w0, wcel(c0, cn))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c0, cn), w0), wcel(c0, crab(s1, cn, w1)))
  sseli(c0, cn, crab(s1, cn, w1))
  mp2an(wss(cn, crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(nat1, crab(s1, cn, w1)), wral(hs0, crab(s1, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(nat1, crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(nat1, cn), w2)
  1nn()
  elrab(s1, nat1, cn, w1, w2)
  mpbi(wral(hs0, crab(s1, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1))), wral(s0, crab(s1, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1))))
  rgen(s0, crab(s1, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)))
  mpcom(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  elrabi(s1, cv(s0), cn, w1)
  3imtr4g(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), w3), wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn), w4))
  anim12d(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn), w3, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn), w4)
  a1d(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(cv(s0))
  elrab(s1, cv(s0), cn, w1, w3)
  elrab(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn, w1, w4)
  cbvralf(s0, hs0, crab(s1, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)))
  nfcv(hs0, crab(s1, cn, w1))
  nfv(hs0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)))
  nfel2(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1))
  nfrab(s0, s1, cn, w1)
  nfcv(s0, cn)
  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  peano5nni(hs0, crab(s1, cn, w1))
  elrab(s1, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s1, cn, w1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), crab(s1, cn, w1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnindf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s1 = 1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ ℕ →(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w4)
} = {
  simprd(c0 ∈ ℕ, w0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  sylib(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ w0), c0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  sseli(c0, cn, { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  mp2an(ℕ ⊆ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, 1 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 },(hs0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }))
  mpbir2an(1 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, 1 ∈ ℕ, w2)
  1nn()
  elrab(s1, nat1, cn, w1, w2)
  mpbi(∀(hs0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 },(hs0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }), ∀(s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 },(s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }))
  rgen(s0, { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  mpcom(s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  elrabi(s1, s0, cn, w1)
  3imtr4g(s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ w3), ((s0[+]1)∈ ℕ ∧ w4))
  anim12d(s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈ ℕ, w3, (s0[+]1)∈ ℕ, w4)
  a1d(s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈ ℕ, (s0[+]1)∈ ℕ)
  peano2nn(s0)
  elrab(s1, s0, cn, w1, w3)
  elrab(s1, (s0[+]1), cn, w1, w4)
  cbvralf(s0, hs0, { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (hs0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  nfcv(hs0, { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  nfv(hs0, (s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  nfel2(s0, (hs0[+]1), { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  nfrab(s0, s1, cn, w1)
  nfcv(s0, cn)
  eleq1d((s0[+]1), { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (hs0[+]1), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1(s0, hs0, caddc, nat1)
  peano5nni(hs0, { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  elrab(s1, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  diff.hs0.w((s0[+]1)∈ { s1 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnindd
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on integers, a deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnindd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cn)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), w4), w5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  impcom(w0, wcel(c0, cn), w1)
  nnind(s0, s1, c0, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w5))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(wcel(cv(s1), cn), w0, w4, w5)
  expcom(wcel(cv(s1), cn), w0, wi(w4, w5))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), w4, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnindd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ)→ w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = 1 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ (((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)∧ w4)→ w5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w5)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  impcom(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ, w1)
  nnind(s0, s1, c0, (w0 → w1), (w0 → w2), (w0 → w3), (w0 → w4), (w0 → w5))
  imbi2d(s0 = 1, w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(s0 = s1, w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(s0 =(s1[+]1), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(s1 ∈ ℕ, w0, w4, w5)
  expcom(s1 ∈ ℕ, w0, (w4 → w5))
  ex((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), w4, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}

blocks.name: nn0min
blocks.content: Extracting the minimum positive integer for which a property ` ch ` does not hold. This uses substitutions similar to ~ nn0ind . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0min(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wn(w1), w2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wb(w3, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w3, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wb(w3, w2))
  -| wi(w0, wn(w4))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cn, w3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wa(wn(w1), w2)), wn(wral(s0, cn0, wn(wa(wn(w1), w2)))))
  sylnib(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wn(wa(wn(w1), w2))), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))))
  pm2.65da(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wrex(s1, cn, w3))
  adantr(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wrex(s1, cn, w3))
  sylib(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wrex(s1, cn, w3)), wral(s1, cn, wn(w3)))
  mpbi(wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wral(s1, cn, wn(w3))), wral(s1, cn, wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w3))))
  rgen(s1, cn, wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w3)))
  nnindf(s0, hs0, cv(s1), wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w3)), wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3))), wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3))), wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w1)), wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w2)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfra1(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
  nfv(s0, wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wsb(hs0, s1, w3), wsbc(s1, nat1, w3))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s1, nat1, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wsb(hs0, s1, w3), w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s1, cv(s0), w3, w1)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)), wn(w2))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w3), w2)
  sbhypf(hs0, s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), w3, w2)
  nfv(s1, w2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsb(hs0, s1, w3)), wn(w3))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w3), w3)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w3)
  mpan9(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3)), wn(w4))
  ax-mp(wi(wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wi(wn(w4), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3)))), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  rspcv(s0, nat0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wi(wn(w4), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wn(w1), wn(w2), wn(w4), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w1, w4)

  nfv(s1, w4)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w2, wsbc(s1, nat1, w3))
  bitr3d(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w2, wsbc(s1, nat1, w3), wsbc(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), w3))
  3syl(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wb(wsbc(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), w3), w2), wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn))
  mpbiri(wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  eleq1(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), nat1, cn)
  sbcieg(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn, w3, w2)
  sbceq1d(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), nat1, wceq(cv(s0), nat0), w3)
  syl6eq(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), nat1, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), nat0, caddc, nat1)
  0p1e1()
  a2d(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w1), wn(w2))
  adantld(wcel(cv(s0), cn), w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wral(hs0, cn0, wsb(hs0, s0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(wral(hs0, cn0, wsb(hs0, s0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  nnnn0(cv(s0))
  rspcv(hs0, cv(s0), cn0, wsb(hs0, s0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2))), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
  sbequ12r(hs0, s0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
  r19.21v(s1, cn, wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w3))
  ralnex(s1, cn, w3)
  ralbii(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wa(wn(w1), w2)))
  imnan(wn(w1), w2)
  dfrex2(s0, cn0, wa(wn(w1), w2))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(w3)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))), wn(wsbc(s1, nat1, w3))))

thm fsumub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

thm fsumub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
